com.epoch.xmlparser

Class XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.xmlparser.XML

  • public class XML
extends Object
    Reads an XML file. Samuel R. Dost, Truth-N-Beauty Software, LLC.

        public void loadURL(String url)
        Prepares a file at a particular URL for reading.

      • parseXML

        public void parseXML(BufferedReader sourceXML)
        Reads a file starting at the root node and sets the node's value.
        Parameters:
        sourceXML - the file to be read

      • parseTag

        private void parseTag(BufferedReader sourceXML)
               throws IOException
        Reads an XML tag's value. Tags are enclosed in < >.
        Parameters:
        sourceXML - the file to be read
        Throws:
        IOException - if the source file can't be read

      • parseAttr

        private int parseAttr(BufferedReader sourceXML,
                      int sourceCh)
               throws IOException
        Reads the next character of an XML attribute's value.
        Parameters:
        sourceXML - the file to be read
        sourceCh - integer corresponding to the character at the beginning of the reading frame
        Returns:
        integer corresponding to the character following the end of the reading frame
        Throws:
        IOException - if the source file can't be read

      • charType

        private byte charType(int theChar)
        Gets a byte corresponding to a character.
        Parameters:
        theChar - an integer corresponding to a character
        Returns:
        byte corresponding to the integer
